description.zh-cn: 中华民国台湾省的市，位于台湾西北部。为新竹都会区的中心城市，是全球高科技代工产业的重镇。
description.en: A city in Taiwan Province, Republic of China, located in northwestern Taiwan. It is the central city of the Hsinchu metropolitan area and a major hub for the global high-tech OEM industry.

description.zh-cn: 台湾政治人物，台湾民众党籍。原任新竹市副市长，自2024年7月26日起代理新竹市市长职务。
description.en: A Taiwanese politician and member of the Taiwan People's Party. Formerly the Deputy Mayor of Hsinchu City, he has been serving as the acting Mayor of Hsinchu since July 26, 2024.

description.zh-cn: 台湾政治人物，台湾民众党籍。曾任新竹市市长，于2024年7月26日因案一审有罪而被停职。
description.en: A Taiwanese politician and member of the Taiwan People's Party. She served as the Mayor of Hsinchu City and was suspended from her duties on July 26, 2024, after being found guilty in the first instance of a legal case.

description.zh-cn: 台湾政治人物，民主进步党籍，曾任新竹市市长。
description.en: A Taiwanese politician of the Democratic Progressive Party who served as the Mayor of Hsinchu City.

description.zh-cn: 新竹市的地方自治行政机关。
description.en: The local self-governing administrative body of Hsinchu City.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国的政党之一。
description.en: A political party in the Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国的主要政党之一。
description.en: One of the major political parties in the Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 台湾的第一个科学园区，是台湾高科技产业发展的核心。
description.en: The first science park in Taiwan, which is the core of Taiwan's high-tech industry development.

description.zh-cn: 台湾的产业技术研究机构，位于新竹。
description.en: An industrial technology research institute in Taiwan, located in Hsinchu.

description.zh-cn: 台湾日治时期成立的工业研究机构，为工业技术研究院的前身之一。
description.en: An industrial research institute established during the Japanese rule of Taiwan, one of the predecessors of the Industrial Technology Research Institute.

description.zh-cn: 日治时期台湾的最高统治机关。
description.en: The supreme ruling body of Taiwan during the period of Japanese rule.

description.zh-cn: 清代福建泉州同安县人，于1691年获准带领亲族开垦竹堑地区。
description.en: A native of Tong'an County, Quanzhou Prefecture, Fujian during the Qing Dynasty, who was permitted to lead his relatives to develop the Zhucian area in 1691.

description.zh-cn: 清代竹堑文人、进士，于1827年呈请兴建新城获准。
description.en: A scholar and Jinshi from Zhucian during the Qing Dynasty, who successfully petitioned for the construction of a new city wall in 1827.

description.zh-cn: 清代淡水抚民同知，负责擘划与监造淡水厅城。
description.en: The Tamsui Subprefectural Magistrate during the Qing Dynasty, responsible for planning and supervising the construction of the Tamsui Ting city wall.

description.zh-cn: 清代淡水厅的城池，位于今日台湾新竹市中心。
description.en: The city wall of Tamsui Ting during the Qing Dynasty, located in the center of modern-day Hsinchu City, Taiwan.

description.zh-cn: 1982年，原新竹县香山乡与新竹市（县辖市）合并，使新竹市重新升格为省辖市。
description.en: In 1982, Xiangshan Township of Hsinchu County merged with Hsinchu City (a county-administered city), leading to Hsinchu City's re-elevation to a provincial city.

description.zh-cn: 台湾政治人物，在林智坚辞职后曾代理新竹市市长。
description.en: A Taiwanese politician who served as acting mayor of Hsinchu City after Lin Chih-chien's resignation.

description.zh-cn: 因市长高虹安遭停职，由副市长邱臣远代理市长职务。
description.en: Due to the suspension of Mayor Kao Hung-an, Deputy Mayor Chiu Chen-yuan serves as the acting mayor.

description.zh-cn: 邱臣远是台湾民众党党员。
description.en: Chiu Chen-yuan is a member of the Taiwan People's Party.

description.zh-cn: 担任第11届新竹市市长，后因案停职。
description.en: Served as the 11th Mayor of Hsinchu City, later suspended due to a legal case.

description.zh-cn: 高虹安是台湾民众党党员。
description.en: Kao Hung-an is a member of the Taiwan People's Party.

description.zh-cn: 因市长林智坚辞职，由秘书长陈章贤代理市长职务。
description.en: Following the resignation of Mayor Lin Chih-chien, Secretary-General Chen Chang-hsien served as the acting mayor.

description.zh-cn: 担任第9、10届新竹市市长。
description.en: Served as the 9th and 10th Mayor of Hsinchu City.

description.zh-cn: 林智坚是民主进步党党员。
description.en: Lin Chih-chien is a member of the Democratic Progressive Party.

description.zh-cn: 台湾总督府在新竹市成立了天然瓦斯研究所，即联合工业研究所的前身。
description.en: The Government-General of Taiwan established the Natural Gas Research Institute in Hsinchu City, the predecessor of the United Industrial Research Institute.

description.zh-cn: 1973年，联合工业研究所与联合矿业研究所、金属工业研究所合并设立工业技术研究院。
description.en: In 1973, the United Industrial Research Institute merged with the Union Mining Research Organization and the Metal Industries Research Institute to establish the Industrial Technology Research Institute.

description.zh-cn: 新竹科学园区的设立吸引了大量投资与高科技人才，极大地促进了新竹市的高科技产业发展。
description.en: The establishment of the Hsinchu Science Park attracted significant investment and high-tech talent, greatly promoting the development of Hsinchu City's high-tech industry.

description.zh-cn: 王世杰带领亲族及同乡至竹堑地区垦植，广兴水利，形成闽南人移民聚落，促进了地区的早期开发。
description.en: Wang Shijie led his relatives and fellow villagers to cultivate the Zhucian area, developing water conservancy and forming a Hokkien immigrant settlement, which promoted the early development of the region.

description.zh-cn: 呈请兴建新城（淡水厅城）并获得批准。
description.en: Petitioned for the construction of a new city wall (Tamsui Ting City Wall) and received approval.

description.zh-cn: 负责擘划并监造以砖石改建的淡水厅城。
description.en: Was responsible for planning and supervising the reconstruction of the Tamsui Ting city wall with bricks and stones.

description.zh-cn: 此次合并使新竹市（原县辖市）重新升格为省辖市。
description.en: This merger led to the re-elevation of Hsinchu City (formerly a county-administered city) to a provincial city.
